text:
@RealCandaceO Candace, please don't fall for this fake "pandemic". The evidence in this file shows that the "coronavirus" is a massive deep state hoax as part of an engineered economic collapse and power grab. Look at the reports of empty hospitals, etc. and speak out.

https://t.co/s03Wn9tvVs
